source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_00<tab>Haermaga is eager to send the Sunshine Savior forth into the sands of Costa del Sol.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

コスタ・デル・ソルのヘールマガは、冒険者たちにヒーロー士の活動を始めてほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_01<tab>Lyonell informs Haermaga that you have agreed to help him learn the ins and outs of helping those in need. The chaperone is keen on this idea, and instructs him to keep watch over the revelers on the northeastern shores of Costa del Sol. Your task is to help the youth spot any signs of trouble, and offer advice on how best to keep the peace.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ヘールマガから、ヒーロー士の活動を始めるよう頼まれた。紅蓮祭会場の浜辺で「紅蓮祭実行委員ボドゥフォアン」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_02<tab>With your steady hand to guide him, Lyonell can now count several deeds of heroism of his own. Every savior needs rest, however, and Beaudefoin soon arrives to take over watch duty. The youth is eager to share tidings of his success with Haermaga and asks you to accompany him.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_02<tab>浜辺でヒーロー士として活動した。報告のため「紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_03<tab>Haermaga is pleased with Lyonell's progress, and explains that his costume is modeled after the Phoenix of legend. Just like that legendary bird, the chaperone hopes that Lyonell can be reborn, and thus recover his lost confidence. This hope is soon tested when an enormous shark emerges from the ocean depths, and Lyonell is forced to drive it back in an impressive display of bravery. After the fight, Lyonell stands dumbfounded at his own actions, and you somehow get the feeling he may require one final nudge in the right direction.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_03<tab>浜辺に襲来した鮫は、リオネルの活躍で撃退された。戦いを終えた「リオネル」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_04<tab>Your presence returns Lyonell to his senses, and he is at last able to look the people he saved in the eyes. While he seems to have suffered no more than surface wounds, Haermaga instructs him to get checked nonetheless. The chairman asks you to join him in awaiting Lyonell's return, while you both keep watch for any further fiends.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_04<tab>リオネルは怪我の手当てのため移動した。彼を待つため、「紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_05<tab>Lyonell returns with a triumphant smile on his face. For your part in bringing the young adventurer into his own, Haermaga makes you an honorary Sunshine Savior, rewarding you with the selfsame costume that gave Lyonell the confidence for heroics. You are now free to enjoy the Moonfire Faire and all its pleasures, for the savior of the sands' watch has only just begun.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_05<tab>かくして常夏の浜辺に、頼れるヒーロー士が誕生した。どのような危機が訪れようとも、きっと彼がいる限り平和は守られるだろう。残りの期間も、紅蓮祭で賑わう常夏のビーチを満喫しよう！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_06<tab>
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_09<tab>

TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_TODO_00<tab>紅蓮祭実行委員ボドゥフォアンと話す
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_TODO_01<tab>紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガと話す
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_TODO_02<tab>リオネルと話す
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_TODO_03<tab>紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガと話す

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_000<tab>I'm ready to start whenever you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>、このあともよろしく頼むぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_001<tab>Lyonell looks every ilm the hero, and no mistake. But looks aren't worth a damn if his heart isn't in it.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_001<tab>さて、これで不審者問題は解決だ。
そろそろ活動開始といきたいが……

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_001<tab>How're you feeling under that mask, lad? Up for the work ahead?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_001<tab>どうだリーヴ、
ヒーロー士としての心構えはできたか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_002<tab>About that... As much as I'd like to jump right into the thick of things, I can't help but harbor some small doubts.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_002<tab>おう！　任せろ！
と言いたいけどな……
実は、少し不安があるんだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_002<tab>The incident with the merchant earlier made me realize that it's one matter to want to aid those in need, but another matter entirely to know who <var 1A 02 /var>needs<var 1A 01 /var> it.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_002<tab>さっき気づいたけど、要望が明確な「依頼人」ならまだしも、
困ってる人を見分けて適切に声をかけるってのは、案外難しい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_003<tab>Fortunately, I have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> by my side─a seasoned adventurer who's helped <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fair share of troubled souls. I've asked <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to take me under <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> wing for a bit, and I hope to be a quick study.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_003<tab>だから、<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>が俺をサポートしてくれるなら、
ぜひそこらへんの判断に力を借りたいぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_004<tab>That's a capital idea, lad. Every adventurer has a few stories of being rewarded with scorn instead of coin. Strange as it sounds, a helping hand must be deft besides.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_004<tab>確かにな、下手に声をかけては拒絶される可能性もあるし、
助けが必要かどうかの即時判断なんて、
ベテランでも難儀するもんだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_005<tab>Well then, let's revise your tasks, eh? Give you a chance to sharpen that nose of yours to the scent of unrest.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_005<tab>ふむ……ならばそのあたりも含め、
あらためてお前さんたちの任務を確認しておこう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_006<tab>Why don't you stand watch over the revelers gathered at the northeastern shores? If you spot trouble brewing, put a lid on it before it spills over.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_006<tab>来場者が集まるコスタ・デル・ソル北東の島を見守り、
トラブルの兆候を確認したら、すぐに対応してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_007<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will attend you in a supervisory capacity. Before leaping into action, ask <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> for advice on how to conduct yourself. <var 08 E905 ((She'll)) ((He'll)) /var> guide you well, I've no doubt.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_007<tab>ただし、リーヴが独断で動くのはまだ難しいだろう。
そこで、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が指揮官役となり、
誰にどう声をかけるべきか、助言を与えてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_008<tab>Now then, off with you! The battlefield on the beach awaits─make me proud, you two, make me proud!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_008<tab>よし、じゃあさっそく、
浜辺という名の戦場に赴こうじゃないか！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_009<tab>A guild member by the name of Beaudefoin is standing by for someone to relieve him of his duty. Speak with him first, then show the realm the measure of a Sunshine Savior!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_009<tab>今は実行委員の「ボドゥフォアン」が臨時で浜辺を見てるから、
奴と話して交代してくれ。
では頼むぞ、ヒーロー士たちよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_011<tab>This is it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's time to prove myself worthy!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_011<tab>いよいよ活動開始だ！
ヒーロー士の名に恥じない働きをしなきゃな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>Beaudefoin should be patrolling somewhere nearby, assuming he hasn't caught a nap under some shade. Relieve him of his post─I'll be here waiting for tidings of your success!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>ボドゥフォアンはすぐそこの浜辺にいるはずだから、
話しかけて交代してやってくれ。
リーヴのこと、頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_013<tab>Why, if it isn't the Sunshine Savior, protector of the summer sands! Please, please, I release the beaches of Costa del Sol to your stewardship!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_013<tab>おーいえぇい、話は聞いてるぜヒーロー士さんたちよ！
さっそく俺と交代して、ビーチを見守ってくれや！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>The following event cannot be skipped. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>このイベントはスキップすることができないため、
コンテンツファインダー申請中の場合などは、ご注意ください。
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q50_200_013<tab>ヒーロー士の活動を開始しますか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_014<tab>Ah, yes. Before I go, allow me to furnish you with these linkpearls. A crucial tool for a pair of strapping guardians such as yourselves. Godsspeed, saviors!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_014<tab>そうだ、ふたりで仕事するなら、
このリンクパールを渡しとくぜ……連携に役立ててくれ。
じゃ、よろしくな！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_015<tab>And now our watch begins! Go on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tell me what you see. If there is trouble lurking about, the Sunshine Savior shall rise to action!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_015<tab>それじゃ<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>、
もしヒーロー士が必要そうな場所があったら指示してくれ！
俺が！　すぐに！！　駆けつけるぜ！！！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q1_000_000<tab>何が気になる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_001<tab>A young Miqo'te lad and lass look like a sellsword just stole their lunch.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_001<tab>落ち込んだ様子のミコッテ族の青年と女の子の姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_002<tab>A shifty pirate lass is sizing up a nearby man. Quite intensely, by the looks of it.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_002<tab>怪しげな女海賊が男の様子を窺っている姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RFHULTIA_000_020<tab>Grrrggg...I failed again. I'll never master the course at this rate...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RFHULTIA_000_020<tab>うう……またダメだった。
高難度ルート、なんて難しいんだ……。
やっぱり、俺には魔城の制覇なんて無理なのか……。
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RMAJHA_000_021<tab>お兄ちゃん、元気出して！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RMAJHA_000_022<tab>...But nothing I say seems to help. I wish I knew how to cheer you up...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RMAJHA_000_022<tab>う～ん、私の言葉だけじゃダメかも？
ほかにも誰か、いないかな……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_023<tab>The lad looks absolutely crestfallen. From what I can gather, he's having some difficulties with the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. I know what it's like to feel success slip from one's grasp time and again...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_023<tab>なにやら、えらく落ち込んだ男がいるな。
聞こえたかぎりだと、常夏の魔城を攻略できなくて、
嘆いてるみたいだが……。
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q2_000_000<tab>どんな指示を出す？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_001<tab>Show him how a Sunshine Savior does it!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_001<tab>魔城攻略のお手本を見せてやれ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_002<tab>Give him some words of encouragement!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_002<tab>青年を励ましてやれ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_003<tab>Leave him be. He'll learn more by lifting himself up.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_003<tab>他人が関わるべきじゃない、放置で！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_030<tab>You want <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> to attempt the course? I'm equal to the challenge, you can be sure, but that would mean leaving my charges unprotected.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_030<tab>それ、今から常夏の魔城を登れってことか？
できなくはないが、俺らがいま浜辺を離れるのはどうだろう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_031<tab>If you ask me, it looks like the lad needs but a few words of encouragement. Yes, that should do the trick. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, wait there─I'll be back in a flash!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_031<tab>それよりあの子、
ほかに元気づけてくれる人がいないか、探してるみたいだ。
俺、ちょっと行ってくるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_032<tab>You read my mind, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Encouragement is my forte! A few carefully placed words should lift this lad over the obstacle in his path. Wait there─I'll be back in a flash!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_032<tab>おう、任せろ！
あの子、ほかに元気づけてくれる人を探してるみたいだしな。
やる気を取り戻せるよう、なんとか励ましてみるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_033<tab>I see the wisdom in that, truly I do. But I can't help but recall my own struggles─where would I have ended up if you and Master Haermaga didn't come along with a few encouraging words?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_033<tab><var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>の言うとおり、
自力で立ち直るべきなのは間違いないな。
だがあの様子だと、あいつしばらくあのままだぞ？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_034<tab>Surely it couldn't hurt, could it? Wait here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I'll be back before you can think of a reason to object!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_034<tab>あの子もほかに元気づけてくれる人を探してるみたいだし、
俺、ちょっと行ってくるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_035<tab>The pair were thankful enough, and the lad seemed once again eager to tackle the course. All in all, a success for the Sunshine Savior!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_035<tab>ありがとうって、お礼を言われたよ。
兄のほうも立ち直ったみたいだし、行ってよかったな！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_040<tab>Bloody Carvallain, thinks he's too good for a pirate, does he?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_040<tab>へたれのカルヴァランめ、
相変わらず、すかした態度しやがって……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_041<tab>I'll make him see, I will. If I just ask him all nice-like...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_041<tab>きょ、今日こそ声を……
だけど、何て言えばいいんだい！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_100_041<tab>"Fancy a stroll on the beach, Carvallain?“ or some such... Bah, he'll just think I'm itchin' fer a duel!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_100_041<tab>「奇遇だねえ、あたしとサシで少し浜辺を歩かないかい？」
……いやいや、これじゃあ決闘の申し込みだと思われちまう！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_042<tab>She's mumbling to herself an awful lot. The menacing provocations of a pirate, no doubt. What do you think, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_042<tab>ブツブツ独りごと言ってる怪しい奴がいるな。
見た感じ海賊っぽいけど、どうする？
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q3_000_000<tab>リオネルにどんな指示を出す？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_001<tab>Just ask if something's the matter.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_001<tab>「何かお困りですか？」と聞いてみよう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_002<tab>Don't worry about her. Worry about the man!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_002<tab>女性にではなく、男性に注意を促せ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_003<tab>We should watch from a safe distance.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_003<tab>あたたかい目で見守ろう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_043<tab>I think you have the right of it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Even I can see that this has the look of something dangerous. I'd best insinuate myself into the matter before it takes a turn.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_043<tab>了解した！
さすがにちょっと怪しいし、それとなく声をかけてみるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_043<tab>Ah, you're right! Anyone staring daggers like that can only have ill intent. I'll warn the man at once!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_043<tab>了解した！
あんなにじーっと見られてるなんて、ただごとじゃないもんな。
警戒したほうがいいって伝えてくるぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_044<tab>The pirate ran off with nary a word of explanation. I can't help but feel as if I interrupted something... Ah, well, there's no telling what could've happened, so as far as I'm concerned, the Sunshine Savior can mark down a victory in his ledger.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_044<tab>よくわからんが、去ってったな。
なぜか少し罪悪感があるが……
何も問題は起きなかったし、良しとしようぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_047<tab>Are you certain? This has the scent of danger...or perhaps something foul has washed ashore. Ah, no matter, I shall trust your advice. It's what you're here for, after all!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_047<tab>見るからに怪しいと思うが、いいのか？
……わかった、ここは<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>を信じて、
何も言わず見守ってみるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_048<tab>Hmm, I'm beginning to understand. She wishes to say something, but it's caught in her throat like a bone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_048<tab>なるほど、なんとなくわかってきた。
つまりアレだ、声をかけたいがかけられない……アレだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_049<tab>...Ah, she's given up. Judging from her manner, she may have the same reservations as I concerning showing her face to others. A kindred spirit, in need of aid...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_049<tab>あー……声かけられなかったか……
彼女も、素顔では素直に人と会話できないのかもしれないな。
少しはわかるぜ、その気持ち……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_050<tab>Alas, I have but a single mask, so I couldn't have helped even if I wanted. But you knew all of that, didn't you? Remarkable foresight, my friend, truly remarkable!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_050<tab>しかしこれは、俺が割り込んでたら台無しだったろうな。
<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>は全部わかったうえで、見守る指示を出したのか？
さすが、すげえ洞察力だぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_060<tab>Well, I see nothing amiss in this area. What about over there?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_060<tab>このあたりにはもう、困ってそうな人はいないみたいだ。
反対側に行ってみようぜ！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q4_000_000<tab>何が気になる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_001<tab>A group of revelers are entranced by the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_001<tab>紅蓮祭の来場客たちが、常夏の魔城を眺めている姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_002<tab>Some muscular fellows are slumped over on the ground.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_002<tab>筋肉質な男たちが地面にへたり込んでいる姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_070<tab>(-Faire Reveler-)Go on, jump! Jump like your life depends on it!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_070<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)よっしゃ行け、跳べ！
根性見せろーー！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_071<tab>(-Faire Reveler-)You'll never make it from there! Watch out or you'll eat sand!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_071<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)あっ、その位置からじゃ届かな……
言わんこっちゃねえ、落ちる……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBB04724_000_072<tab>(-Faire Reveler-)Oh no, is he all right!? I think I heard a snap...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBB04724_000_072<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)えっ、あいつ大丈夫？
なんかもがいてるような……
あれ、マズくない！？
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q5_000_000<tab>リオネルにどんな指示を出す？
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A5_000_001<tab>リーヴ！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A5_000_002<tab>救助を！！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_073<tab>……ッ！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_074<tab>Phew... Apologies for not waiting for your guidance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I dived into the ocean without a thought for what would come next...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_074<tab>ごめん、<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>の指示を聞いてから動くべきだったけど、
気づいたら海に飛び込んでた……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_075<tab>Before I knew it, there was water under my mask. I was sure I'd meet my end then and there...but somehow, I found my bearings, and brought that man ashore. I suppose fortune favors the reckless, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_075<tab>マスクに海水が入って死ぬかと思ったが……
運よく助けられて、本当によかったよ。
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBC04724_000_076<tab>(-筋肉質な男たち-)ぜえ、ぜえ……。
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_077<tab>おじちゃんたち、大丈夫？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBD04724_000_078<tab>(-Muscle-bound Roegadyn-)My muscles burn for more... But gods, I can barely see straight...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBD04724_000_078<tab>(-筋肉質なルガディン族-)まだだ、俺の筋肉は、まだ死んじゃいない……。
だが……うう、目が回る……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_079<tab>Oh no, that's not good! Should I call upon one of the chaperones!?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_079<tab>大変！
紅蓮祭実行委員の方を呼んできましょうか！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_080<tab>I suppose this heat and intense exercise mix as well as oil does with water. Should I offer assistance?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_080<tab>どうやら、運動のしすぎで参ってるみたいだな。
暑いし、無理もない……
<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>、彼らを救護したほうがいいか？
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q6_000_000<tab>リオネルにどんな指示を出す？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_001<tab>Tell them to find a spot of shade to rest in.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_001<tab>休憩を入れるように伝えよう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_002<tab>Tell them to drink plenty of fluids.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_002<tab>水分をとるよう伝えよう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_003<tab>Look at all those muscles. They'll be fine.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_003<tab>筋肉もりもりだし、大丈夫だろう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_082<tab>You're quite right! Even the strongest of us will wither before the sun without water and rest. I'll go and tell them as much!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_082<tab>ああ、了解した！
暑い中で汗を流し続けるのは危険だからな、
水分をとって休むよう、勧めてくるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_083<tab>I see that, but what use are muscles before the pitiless rays of the sun? At the very least, I should recommend a short constitutional.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_083<tab>いくら鍛えてても、
常夏のこの島で運動し続けるのは危険じゃないか？
ぶっ倒れてからじゃ遅いし、ちょっと俺、休憩を薦めてくるぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_089<tab>I had a word with the men, and they insisted there was nothing to worry about. Still, my duty is to dig out the roots of trouble before they break soil, so in that respect I consider this a success.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_089<tab>ふぅ、なんとか話を聞いてくれた。
大したことじゃないかもしれないが、
トラブルの未然対処も俺らの仕事だからな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_090<tab>Speaking of which, I see no further signs of distress along the beach. I believe our relief should be along soon, and truth be told I'm glad for it. I can't bear this stifling heat for much longer...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_090<tab>見た感じ、いまは困ってる人がいなさそうだ。
俺らも少しだけ、ひと息入れるかい？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_091<tab>Still, better to be baking under the hot sun than drowning under the ocean waves. Every breath I took invited more water into my lungs... If one of the seven hells lies on the ocean floor, doubtless its doors were cast open for my arrival.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_091<tab>ふぅ、暑い……実は、さっき海に入ったときから、
マスクが水浸しで……息苦しくて……蒸れて……。
なかなかに地獄だったんですよ……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_092<tab>But I'm grateful to be alive and well, and with a few feats of derring-do under my belt besides. That's in no small part thanks to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─your sound guidance led me to take action where I might have been paralyzed by doubt.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_092<tab>しかし今回の件、俺ひとりじゃ、
的確な対処は難しかったでしょう。
カニみたいに浜辺を右往左往するだけだったかもしれません。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_093<tab>I have Haermaga's costume to thank, too. It may very well have some special power to turn the timid into the lionhearted...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_093<tab>堂々と臨めたのはきっと、このスーツの力と……
何より、見守ってくれていたあなたのおかげですよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_094<tab>Impressive work, you two! I say you've earned some rest, eh? Allow me to watch over our patrons─I can only hope my stretch is half as eventful as yours was!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_094<tab>ひゃっは～、お疲れさん、頑張ってるみたいじゃねえか！
働き詰めでヘールマガが心配してたから、一度戻ったらどうだ？
その間は俺が見回っておくからよ！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_096<tab>お気遣いありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_096<tab>I suspect Master Haermaga will want to hear of our successes here. Let's go and make our report.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_096<tab>では、お言葉に甘えて……
報告がてら、ヘールマガの旦那のところへ向かいましょうか。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_100<tab>I know I yet have a long journey ahead of me, but I hope that I've taken at least a few bounding strides toward my goal.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_100<tab>こんなへっぽこでも、ヒーロー士として、
ふさわしい働きができたんでしょうか……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_101<tab>Ah, there you are! The stories of your deeds precede you─revelers up and down the beaches are taken with your bravery.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_101<tab>おう、ご苦労さん！
お前さんたちの活動、話題になってるぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_102<tab>The one you plucked from the sea even came to offer his personal thanks. By all accounts, your lost confidence has been restored, and more besides. I reckon you're ready to set off on your own, but I won't force it upon you if you've got lingering reservations.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_102<tab>助けられた来場客が、わざわざ感謝を伝えに来てくれたりもした。
リーヴよ、お前さんも自信がついただろう。
そろそろひとりで大丈夫だと思うが、どうだ？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_103<tab>I... Well, truth be told, I wouldn't have been able to do it without <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s help. And this mask, of course─donning it makes me forget the meaning of the word “impossible.”
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_103<tab>マスクがあれば、なんとかやれそうではありますが……。
いえ、やはり俺なんか……
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのサポートがあってこそです。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_104<tab>Hmm... You have to realize that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> won't be around forever, so inclined to adventuring abroad as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is. A savior needs to be able to carry their burden alone if they're to earn the trust of others.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_104<tab>ふむ……。
しかし、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>はいつまでも居られまい。
ヒーロー士はあくまでお前なんだ、気張ってもらわんとな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_105<tab>You know, you never did tell us <var 1A 02 /var>why<var 1A 01 /var> you're so frightened of showing your face. Something tells me you didn't crawl out of your mother's womb with your hands covering your eyes. Am I right?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_105<tab>そもそもリーヴ、お前さんどうして素顔だと消極的なんだ？
顔を出すこと自体には抵抗がないようだし、
生来の性格とも思えないが……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_106<tab>...Aye. It happened when I was just getting my feet wet as an adventurer, during a job that should have been unremarkable...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_106<tab>確かに俺、冒険者になりたての頃は、
普通に素顔で活動していました。
ですが……

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_107<tab>We were tasked with guarding a merchant caravan, which naturally drew the attention of a terrible, slavering beast. Instead of sticking it with a spear like I was supposed to, I was knocked senseless within moments.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_107<tab>俺、仲間とともに隊商の護衛任務を請け負ったことがあるんです。
そのとき、巨大な魔物に急襲され……
守り手のはずの俺は、真っ先に気絶させられました。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_108<tab>When I regained my senses, I saw that my partner had been dealt a grievous wound and the caravan was in shambles─the job was an utter failure. For a blessing, none lost their lives, but <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> lost all standing in the eyes of my allies and employers.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_108<tab>気づいたら仲間が重傷を負っていて、依頼も失敗。
死者こそ出ませんでしたが、
あとで仲間や依頼人から言われたんです。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_109<tab>They blamed me for their injuries and the damage to their goods, and rightfully so. The memory of their scornful gazes is etched in my mind, and I see them every time I look another in the eyes.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_109<tab>「役立たず、お前のせいで傷ついた、お前のせいで大損害だ」
事実そのとおりですから、言われて当然ですよね。
それ以来、自分が情けなくて、人の目が怖くなり……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_110<tab>So you coped with your fear by hiding behind a helm. It's starting to make sense...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_110<tab>それでお前さんは、顔を隠して仕事をするようになった、と。
なるほどな……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_111<tab>You know, Lyonell, that suit's more than a masterwork of comfort. There's a meaning behind its design, if you can believe it...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_111<tab>……なあリオネル、お前さんが着ているスーツの、
もうひとつの「ご利益」を信じてみないか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_112<tab>See, it's meant to evoke the image of the Phoenix. That legendary bird symbolizes rebirth, rising from the ashes over and over again, each time shining brighter than before.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_112<tab>そのスーツ、実は不死鳥フェニックスをモチーフとしていてな。
……転生の炎をまとうその鳥は、「復活と再生」の象徴だ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_113<tab>Seeing your triumphs as a Sunshine Savior has made me certain that the Phoenix's fire burns within <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>, Lyonell. And when those flames are stoked, you'll be reborn with more courage than you ever could've imagined.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_113<tab>それを着てヒーロー士の仕事をこなしたお前さんには、
きっと転生の炎が宿ってるはずさ。
必ず復活し、自信を再生させられる……そう信じるんだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_114<tab>All this time, I was wrapped in the Phoenix's embrace... Yes, if there's a chance I might be born anew, then the path ahead of me is clear!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_114<tab>そうですね、この仕事を通して立ち直れるなら……
どんなにへっぽこでも、やるしかない、か……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_115<tab>I'm heading back to the beach─this time without a mask!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_115<tab>俺、もう一度浜辺に行ってきます……今度はマスクなしで！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_116<tab>Something on your mind? Did I lay it on too thick?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_116<tab>何か言いたげだな……クサいってか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_117<tab>When you get to my age, you can't help but light fires under those that need it.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_117<tab>まあわかるが……俺もおっさんだからな、若いのが燻ってると、
つい余計なことを言いたくなっちまうわけだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_118<tab>And that lad needed it something fierce, so I lit a raging bonfire under his arse! Just had to work with the embers that were already there─that burning desire of his to help the downtrodden.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_118<tab>心が折れたってんなら、火にくべて鍛え直しゃいいだけさ。
そのための種火を、アイツはすでに持ってるはずなんだ。
「人を助けたい」って熱意をよ！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_119<tab>(-浜辺からの悲鳴-)か、か、か、怪物だーーーーー！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_500<tab>くそっ、俺はまた……また、何も……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_501<tab>Not so fast, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If someone jumps to his rescue again, that fire I just lit will be snuffed out. We need to think of a way to help him that doesn't involve doing all the heavy lifting.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_501<tab>待ってくれ！
いま他人が助けたら、あいつはまた無力感を味わうことになる！
どうにか手出しをせず、支えてやれないか……！？
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q30_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_001<tab>The Sunshine Savior never backs down!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_001<tab>負けるな、ヒーロー士！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_002<tab>Rise from the ashes of defeat, and be reborn!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_002<tab>不屈の心で立ち上がれッ！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_003<tab>No monster can stand against Lyonell!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_003<tab>お前ならやれる！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_004<tab>If you can't do it, no one can!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_004<tab>がーんばれッ！！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOB04724_000_600<tab>(-Moonfire Reveler-)<var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> right! You're <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> Sunshine Savior! So save us!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOB04724_000_600<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)そうだ、あんたならできる！！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOB04724_000_601<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)やれるだけ、ぶちかましてやんなッ！！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_602<tab>こんな俺を……信じてくれるのか……

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_603<tab>I can't let them down. I must uphold the reputation of the Sunshine Savior!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_603<tab>なら……
俺も全身全霊で応えなきゃ、なぁッ……！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_604<tab>うおおおおおおおッ！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_605<tab>Bathe in the flames of my rebirth! Bathe in the flames of the Phoenix!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_605<tab>これが俺の転生の炎……
フェニックスインパクトォォォォォッ！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_120<tab>The lad looks unharmed─a small miracle, all things considered.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_120<tab>見たところ、大きな怪我はないようだな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_121<tab>I came as fast as I could, but it seems I was not needed. Lyonell really made stew out of that shark, didn't he? It seems Haermaga was right about him.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_121<tab>遠目から見えたが……あの巨大鮫をひとりで倒すたぁ、
すげえじゃねえか！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_122<tab>That was so scary! I thought it would eat me!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_122<tab>食べられちゃう！？
って、すっごくドキドキした！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_123<tab>Thank the heavens he was here! I don't know what I'd do if Khloe came to any harm...
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_123<tab>クロが無事で、よかった……！
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_TKEBBE_100_123<tab>クロちゃん、だいじょうぶ……？
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_124<tab>あー、ええと……大丈夫だったか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_125<tab>That was so frightening, but so exciting at the same time! I'm gonna write about you in my diary!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_125<tab>怖かったけど、すっごくドキドキした！
お兄ちゃんのこと、日記に書いておくね！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_126<tab>Thank you, thank you, thank you! Khloe's safe, and it's all because of you!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_126<tab>おかげで、この子にも怪我はありませんでした。
本当にありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_127<tab>But I was only─ Ah, never mind that. You're most welcome, of course.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_127<tab>俺はなにも……いや……
こちらこそ、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_128<tab>I'm not sure what to call what just happened, but the word “miracle” comes to mind. Did I truly vanquish that bloodthirsty brute of a shark?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_128<tab>怪我はなかった、か……よかった。
まぐれどころか奇跡みたいなものですが……
誰も怪我しないうちに撃退できて、本当によかった。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_129<tab>That you did, and without a single scratch on our guests. You showed them what the Sunshine Savior stands for and gave them a display they won't soon forget. All on your own, too.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_129<tab>ふん、まぐれなもんか！
そもそもやれると判断したから、ヒーロー士を任せたんだ。
ちゃんと、お前の実力だろうよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_129<tab>But even a savior isn't invincible, eh? Go with Beaudefoin and get yourself checked. Wouldn't want you to be done in by a few scrapes.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_129<tab>とはいえ手傷は負っただろう？
ボドゥフォアンに案内してもらって、手当を受けてくるといい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_131<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I will keep an eye on things here in case any other seaborne predators decide to try their luck.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_131<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、俺たちはこの島で待っていよう。
念のための見張りも兼ねてな。
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_140<tab>ようリーヴ、戻ったか。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_141<tab>Thanks to you two, talk of the Adventurers' Guild is on the lips of all in Costa del Sol. As far as I'm concerned, we can consider the Sunshine Savior a rousing success and a boon for the guild.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_141<tab>今回の件、お前さんたちのおかげで、
冒険者ギルドの活躍をアピールできた。
結果論だが、広報活動としての紅蓮祭は大成功と言っていい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_142<tab>Lyonell here deserves a standing ovation for the bravery he displayed. Taking down a fiend like that and keeping the younglings safe is a feat very few can boast of.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_142<tab>つまりリオネルよ、お前さんの働きがでかかったってことだ。
咄嗟に子供をかばって魔物に立ち向かうなんざ、
誰もができることじゃない、見事だったぞ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_143<tab>As my vision dimmed, I heard <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> call out to me. It was <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> words that delivered me from the brink, and allowed me to go further still.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_143<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの声、
倒れかけたあのとき、はっきりと聞こえました。
立ち上がれたのは間違いなく、あなたのおかげです。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_144<tab>They might call me the Sunshine Savior, but you're the true hero of the day. You've given me the courage to go on alone, and for that there is no way I can repay you.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_000_144<tab>浜辺の守護者がヒーロー士だというなら、
真のヒーローは、ずっと俺を見守ってくれたあなたですよ。
この先はきっと、ひとりでもやっていける……本当にありがとう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_145<tab>Indeed our savior had a savior of his own. A fact we're all grateful for.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_145<tab>なるほど、リーヴを見守った、もうひとりの守護者か。
確かに、そうだな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_146<tab>I'm of a mind to make you an honorary Sunshine Savior, suit and all. Wear it well, and don't ask me how many more of these I have stashed away.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_146<tab>ならば<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、紅蓮祭実行委員は、
あんたを「名誉ヒーロー士」として讃えさせてもらおう。
今回の報酬には、リーヴと同じスーツを進呈するぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_147<tab>Now go on, forget your worries and take in your fill of the festivities, for the Moonfire Faire is safe so long as Lyonell stands as its guardian!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_147<tab>紅蓮祭はまだまだ続く……残りの期間、
今度は来場客として、ゆっくり紅蓮祭を楽しんでくれよな！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_147<tab>Aye, I shall remain vigilant for any signs of trouble. And if aught appears to threaten the peace...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_100_147<tab>それじゃ、俺はもう一度見回りに行ってきます。
大丈夫、たとえ何が来ようとも、浜辺の平和は……
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_LYONELL_200_147<tab>俺が！　絶対に！！　護ってみせますから！！！
